title: TEMPLATE: Maintenance task — {{title}}
description:
## Context
{{context}}

## Goal
{{goal}}

## Checklist
- Identify scope and blast radius (site-wide vs single post vs assets)
- Prefer editing theme overrides in `layouts/` and `assets/` (don’t edit `themes/` directly)
- If touching images: rename descriptively, convert to WebP (`cwebp` for stills, `gif2webp` for animations), remove originals, update Markdown links + meaningful alt text
- If touching letter art: it lives in `assets/letters/` and is Git LFS managed

## Validation
- Run `make build` (primary check is clean `hugo --minify` build)
- If relevant, run `make serve` to spot-check the change

## Notes
- Install/pull LFS assets before building if needed: `git lfs install && git lfs pull`
- Keep changes minimal and consistent with existing Hugo/SCSS patterns

title: TEMPLATE: Edit post — {{post_title}} ({{lang}})
description:
## Context
{{context}}

## Post
- Path: `content/posts/{{post_slug}}/index.{{lang}}.md`
- Language suffix: `.en.md`, `.de.md`, `.he.md` (use existing pattern in this repo)

## Goal
{{goal}}

## Content checklist
- TOML front matter is correct (title/date/tags/draft as needed)
- Keep post-specific images alongside the Markdown in `content/posts/{{post_slug}}/`
- Use meaningful alt text for all images

## Image handling
- Rename imported assets to descriptive filenames
- Convert PNG/JPEG to WebP (`cwebp`) and GIF to WebP (`gif2webp`) while preserving intent
- Remove originals after conversion and update Markdown links

## Validation
- Run `make build`
- Optional preview: `make serve`
